overview:
As a mobile technology professional, serial entrepreneur and angel investor, Richard D. Lane has spent the better part of the past 30 years building companies primarily in the mobile technology sector.

Prior to joining RESOLUTE Partners, Rich was CEO of Airpath Wireless where he merged the company into Aptilo Networks. Prior to Airpath, he started Jitterbug by GreatCall, a cellular phone solution targeted at the boomer market. Rich also served as CEO of PacTel Mobile Services and PureSpeech; COO of Voice Control Systems, GreatCall, and Reflection Technology and General Manager of Panasonic’s wireless telecommunications business unit.
